content.rendered:
Adventus Premium Partnerships

Bespoke partnerships tailored to achieve your institution’s goals
UWE Bristol and Adventus Premium Partnerships

Turbo charge your partnership with Adventus for greater outcomes with maximum efficiency

Increase volume of quality applications from your target markets

Optimize student yield through priority matching

Multiply your channel sales impact through the Adventus recruitment network

Prioritize your admission workflow based on yield propensity

Premium account management and market intelligence from across the Adventus ecosystem

How it works

A premium partnership with Adventus that brings you to the forefront of our marketplace and creates a flow of well-matched students through the most highly engaged Recruiters

Winning strategy

  • Expert advice to refine your proposition 
  • Competitor intelligence on course offerings, service levels, pricing and scholarships 
  • Access to local Adventus.io experts in-country and priority invitations to high visibility destination marketing events

Channel sales activation

We launch a custom recruitment plan to generate more high quality applications through:

  • Identifying, targeting and training our highest performing agents that are advising the profile of student you are seeking
  • Priority training of Adventus channel sales team, responsible  for supporting agents in our marketplace, to sell your proposition and create momentum in generating student demand.
  • Refining your channel sales plan by market to ensure we are positioning your offer appropriately

Data-driven matching

  • Incorporate our Adventus Drive product suite into a comprehensive recruitment solution
  • Automated recommendation of your programmes to students interested in similar courses
  • Access to the full suite of Adventus Premium Analytics products, providing unique data on applicant demand, competitor benchmarking, and student profiling

Winning strategy

  • Expert advice to refine your proposition 
  • Competitor intelligence on course offerings, service levels, pricing and scholarships 
  • Access to local Adventus.io experts in-country and priority invitations to high visibility destination marketing events

Channel sales activation

We launch a custom recruitment plan to generate more high quality applications through:

  • Identifying, targeting and training our highest performing agents that are advising the profile of student you are seeking
  • Priority training of Adventus channel sales team, responsible  for supporting agents in our marketplace, to sell your proposition and create momentum in generating student demand.
  • Refining your channel sales plan by market to ensure we are positioning your offer appropriately

Data-driven matching

  • Incorporate our Adventus Drive product suite into a comprehensive recruitment solution
  • Automated recommendation of your programmes to students interested in similar courses
  • Access to the full suite of Adventus Premium Analytics products, providing unique data on applicant demand, competitor benchmarking, and student profiling

Success Story

University of West of England Bristol

Location

Located in Bristol, United Kingdom with easy access to London

Size

38,000+ students and  over 3,800 staff

No. of Courses Offerred

190+ Bachelors programmes and 100+ Doctoral and Masters programmes via Adventus

Rankings

Ranked 24th on the Guardian League Table 2023 out of 121 universities in the UK

Trusted by 0+ institutions globally

Talk to us

REQUEST DEMO
